name: expert-typescript
description: TypeScript code generation and instruction expert trained on multiple high-quality sources including GPT-3.5-turbo generated examples, TypeScript Handbook documentation, and the-stack TypeScript subset.
author: hivellm

rope_scaling._comment: Qwen3-specific NTK-by-parts scaling (Î²=0.25). Matches Rust implementation.

adapters._comment: DoRA r=8-16 for TypeScript (r=12 balanced). Handles long-range code constraints better than LoRA.

soft_prompts.name: typescript_style
soft_prompts.init_text: Generate TypeScript code following ESLint and Prettier conventions. Use proper types, interfaces, and modern ES6+ syntax. Write clean, maintainable code.
soft_prompts.purpose: Enforce TypeScript style conventions (naming, formatting, API usage)

perf._comment: DoRA r=12 needs 18MB VRAM (same as SQL). Code generation is CPU-bound, latency mainly from model size.

runtime._comment: Metadata for Rust/Candle runtime. Qwen3 uses custom flash attention kernel (not standard SDPA).

dataset._comment: TypeScript training dataset: 318k+ unique examples (base: 20k + Handbook: 155 + the-stack: 298k). Massively expanded from 20k to 318k+ examples (1,493% increase). Ready for training.

config._comment: DoRA r=12 for TypeScript. Includes MLP for better API/pattern learning.

decoding._comment: TypeScript validation with tsc, moderate temperature for code variation
